description: The program silently crashes when started.

Fails silently if opened from menu.
Fails with error if run from terminal
:~$ static-blog-app
/snap/static-blog-app/3/static-blog-app: error while loading shared libraries: libssl.so.3: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

No mention of this app on the developer's website so it looks like it has been abandoned.
summary: App installs but does not open
